title: Large investors increased stake in Trump Media by hundreds of millions
summary: Trump Media raised 2.5 billion from 50 institutional investors despite posting 400.9 million in losses on just 3.6 million revenue. The funds were earmarked for bitcoin purchases rather than operations, in what critics called an attempt to curry favor with the president.
description: Large institutional investors have increased their stakes in Trump Media to the tune of hundreds of millions of dollars, despite the firm posting massive losses in 2024, in a possible attempt to curry favor with the president
